name: WP Widget Styler
author: WebEmpire

sections.description:
Power-up your WordPress widgets using these awesome styler configurations.

Here are the WP Widget Styler features.

  • General Settings A General section includes Title Tag, Visibility, Alignment options.
  • Style Settings It includes all Colors & Background settings for your every widget.
  • Responsive Visibility A Responsive Visibility section provides you privilege to Show / Hide your widget on responsive devices.
  • Display Rules A Display Rules section let’s you enable your current widget based on Display rulesets.
  • User Login State Conditional Logic A User Login State Conditional Logic section grants you to control widget visibility based on user login status.
  • Advanced An Advanced section includes Custom Classes & ID privilege for the widget.
  • Easily manageable addons based on your requirement, which will not add excessive load or CSS or any extra code.
  • A translation friendly interface that makes working easy and fun.
  • Built with responsive designs.

Many more Features are Coming Soon!

  • Advanced Typography Options
  • Advanced Spacing Controls
  • Widget Shortcode Provision
  • Sticky Widget Settings
  • Visibility Configurations Based on User Roles
  • Page Builder Support
  • Controls for Sidebar as well
  • Live Preview Support
  • Import-Export Privilege

The WP Widget Styler is built for speed and performance along with lots of flexibility and ease of use and makes your widget elegant.

Optimized For Performance & Speed

Being a Powerful team of developers, designers, and marketers on board, we understand your website is the face of your business life. So it’s our duty to represent it in a more attractive manner. And of course, we know the importance of site performance. Therefore, we have made all provisions to reduce the number of server requests and making the WP Widget Styler lighter than the lightest.

The settings to disable addons that you do not need and on your site that lets you load only the addons you use, let you keep minimal elements that do not affect your site performance.

Support That Cares!

We understand the need for a quality product backed by dedicated support that cares. We are here to listen to all your queries and help you make the most out of our plugin.

Need help? We are just a click away!

Want your advanced customizations? Let’s Get in Touch!
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Under the Appearance page you will see Widget Styler menu listed where you can control all the addons status
  4. Then you can start by exploring these configurations for every widget under the Appearance > Widgets.
